website_summaries.verdict: An extremely strong product suitable for work with table saws, band saws, and other appliances.
pros: Does not tip over as some lighter roller stands do
Stays in one place thanks to non-skid feet
cons: People who have owned previous editions of this product occasionally voice disappointment with the quality of this version

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: Terrific heavy duty stand that locks better than any other stand I have ever used thanks to a wedge-shaped inner post design. I can’t speak to the people complaining about problems with heavy loads, but this has worked beautifully for me. Highly recommended — I may buy more (if I can figure out where to put them) as semi-permanent infeed/outfeed stands for my table saw.
customer_reviews.author: Rob McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Fine investment!
customer_reviews.text: I set both supports to bandsaw table height. But one support is on the floor, the other on a half inch rubber mat. Inside the outer square tube is an inner weldment wedge shaped full length. Adjustment down by backing off the crank is highly precise; I imagine a few thousandths of an inch is possible, much less than a 32nd or 64th. I guess it correlates with the thread pitch of the crank, after a study you could make quick adjustments with partial turns of the crank. Set up a machinist's travel gauge then see the result of a quarter turn of the crank. Since the weldment is a wedge there is no slippage. Fine investment !
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Davis

customer_reviews.title: Negative reviews don’t match my experience
customer_reviews.text: I just received my roller stand, examined the parts carefully, assembled the stand easily and am impressed with its sturdiness, stability and build quality. Yes, it is made in China as the package clearly Indicates but this is a great product nonetheless. I don’t give 5 stars easily but this product deserves the rating.
customer_reviews.author: John Molstre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, sturdier than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and now own three. I managed to dent the roller on one of them when I fumbled a heavy piece of steel and knocked over the roller stand causing the roller to impact a sharp concrete corner, but that is no reflection on the product itself. I haven't been able to find contact information for the manufacturer to order a replacement roller. Overall an excellent product and I endorse it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Easily Adjusted Roller Stand
customer_reviews.text: This pedestal roller stand is nearly perfect. It was easy to assemble and is easy to correctly adjust to the proper height. The stand is study and well made. The feet can be easily adjusted if your shop floor is not level. The stand is heavy enough that it will not easily tip over. Before, I had a cheap light-weight stand from Sears. This stand is a significant improvement. I would purchase this stand again. Its made in the USA, so that is good. I have revised this review to downgrade it from 5 stars to 4 stars, since it is not so easy to do a fine adjustment of the height.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce &Teri

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality. Tips over easily because base is too small. Sturdy construction but should really be about $30 less expensive due to cheap Chinese build (welds) quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy stands. I needed a shorter one so I cut off a few inches off the bottom tube and stand.
customer_reviews.author: Spudrn

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than expected for adjusting height—- some people reviewed as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works even better than expected for adjusting height—- some people reviewed as it if they had it assembled backwards Does everything I need
customer_reviews.author: GARY A RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Gives ever-so-slightly under heavy loads
customer_reviews.text: This is a solidly built item and an effective extra set of hands. Just note that it will give the slightest bit under heavier loads which can be a bit of a liability if you require perfectly machined parts. That said, you can then re-adjust it to accommodate for the give.
customer_reviews.author: chexxchexx

customer_reviews.title: A pair of these is like having an assistant.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the steady micro adjustability. When I’m setting up and leveling out my material to the saw or thicknesses planer and the roller stand in and out feed, I start high and all it takes is slightly backing off the lock a 1/4 turn and the stand lowers in a nice controlled way while supporting my materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our metal fab shop, heavy duty enough for commercial work.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Tool
customer_reviews.text: Its strong and steady. The lock style makes it hard to get dead-on accuracy, but I rarely find that necessary with a support stand. My only real complaint is that during manufacturing, a lot of the white paint got on the threads of the feet so I have to use a wrench to make height adjustments on 3 feet for right now instead of finger-tip adjustments like on the 4th. I do expect the other 3 to loosen up in time though, so its probably not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Maple

customer_reviews.title: extra hand
customer_reviews.text: No more balancing acts with the longer boards! Very sturdy and stable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for infeed to my table saw....... Worked perfect, easy to assemble, and easy to adjust. Will buy more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: When working alone its really good to have a solid support for cutting ect. This is really solid well built it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: StevenB

customer_reviews.title: Real Heavy-Duty
customer_reviews.text: This roller stand is made of heavy-duty material, built to last. The foot adjustments make it ideal for working on an uneven floor. I am going to purchase at least 2 more of these. They are comparatively expensive, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lee W Peterson

customer_reviews.title: HTC HSS-18 16" Work Support is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews posted on this product are *NOT* about this product. For example, there is *NO* plastic knob on this product. Another talks about a $17 stand. They are obviously posted to the incorrect product. This product has a steel handle to tighten the heighth adjustment. The stand is sturdy, and stable, as have been all HTC products I've purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Shaker

customer_reviews.title: very tuff product
customer_reviews.text: Very tuff. This does not fall over. Light wieght ones do fall over. This product has some wieght to it and is very sturdy. I will buy more from this company
customer_reviews.author: greeves

customer_reviews.title: liked it so well I bought another
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, heavy duty, very stable stands. Liked the first one so well I bought a second.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Strong roller stand
customer_reviews.text: I needed a strong infeed and outfeed roller stand to use when resawing heavy (2 -3") lumber on a bandsaw and for surface sanding with a power machine. Two of these filled the bill. Strong, adjustable height, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Collector

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty, well made, quality stand. It’s expensive, but I think it's worth the money. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Better than some but far worse than the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these for our custom fabrication shop, to be honest they were as disappointment from day one. Height adjustment is a two hand affair and not precise as one would think based on the desc. The roller is still pretty light duty and the frame is also flimsy. I just bought a few other heavy stands that amazon now sells by vestil and they kick this stands but for only about $90 depending on height. I am far happier with these other stands for less cash and they can take over 1,000 lbs! Adjustment on these does need an allen wrench but i welded a holder onto the stand and its a non issue now.
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use in shop for several projects, very handy. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: canam boy

customer_reviews.title: Old HTC stand=good.  New HTC stand=piece of mind bogglingly shoddy workmanship.  Why, HTC?
customer_reviews.text: Sad, sad, sad. I have used an old HTC stand like this that was made in the USA and served faithfully for many years. I ordered this stand in mid-2016 and it's a total piece of junk. The stand was rusting under the paint, the roller was seized, the mounting flange for the roller head was bent, and the legs didn't bolt on properly. It appears that HTC moved production to the lowest possible cost manufacturer in China and didn't bother with even the most cursory quality control. The Rockler heavy duty roller stand is now a much superior alternative to this formerly good quality stand from HTC.
customer_reviews.author: wandern

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality stand for all around the shop machine use.The leg adjustment works great for fine level tuning.Also,with its roller wedge height adjustment,you do not have to worry about mashing your fingers when you make the up or down height setting.Best of all,its made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Weyer

customer_reviews.title: super duty roller support
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,high quailty,very strong & easy to use this is my second set for our shop. 5 stars *****
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Bellinger

product_meta.title: HTC HSS-18 Super Duty Adjustable 28-Inch to 45 1/2-Inch Tall Pedestal Roller Stand with 16-Inch Ball Bearing Roller, 500 Lbs. Material support
product_meta.description:
Size:28 to 45-1/2 InchFor the big jobs, we present our heavy duty adjustable roller stand. This high quality support stand sports an extra-large 500lb capacity, making it a true workhorse. The height adjusts from 28” to 45.5” high, meaning it’ll support material for almost any machine – bandsaws, planers, table saws, and many others. Or use it a hundred other ways – anytime you need “support that feeds”, you’ll reach for this support stand. The 16” x 2” ball bearing roller is made from high quality galvanized steel, and moves with a smooth precision that makes material feeding easy. The sturdy legs end with 4 non-skid feet that are leveling, adding to the stability. And HTC’s exceptional wedge lock, which tightens under load, is present as well. If you do heavy feed work, this is the ideal support stand for your shop.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This versatile work support may be the most valuable accessory you'll ever have in your shop. Can be used for infeed or outfeed or to support wide panels. Unique leg construction allows height adjustment from 43-1/2 to 26-1/2 inches, even while loaded - with one hand! Legs fold and latch for easy portability and storage. 1 roller.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty capacity – the strong 500lb capacity means your heaviest material can effortlessly be fed into your band saw, table saw, planers, and much more.
Adjustable height for added versatility – it’s not only strong, but this roller support stand adjusts from 28” to 45. 5” high. Perfect for almost any job.
Rock solid stability – four non-skid leveling feet ensure the stand stays put, giving you perfect stability.
Smooth ball bearing roller ideal for all feed and support jobs – the 16” ball bearing roller is galvanized steel and ultra-smooth in motion. It’s ideal for any type of material, large or small.
Wedge lock for added strength – The wedge lock tightens under load, making HTC Support Stands the best in the business.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
